inclusion.criterion: presenting to the Division of Urogynecology at the University of Rochester Medical Center/Strong Memorial Hospital
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: undergoing gynecologic surgery which requires postoperative placement of a transurethral catheter
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Subjects must be competent to give informed consent
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Any patient less than 18 years of age
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Patients undergoing surgery that does not require transurethral catheterization postoperatively
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Patients not competent to give informed consent
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Patients undergoing procedures requiring prolonged bladder decompression (i.e. fistula repair)
exclusion.label: met

notes: 78 year-old male with history of BPH and multiple urological procedures, including suprapubic prostatectomy.
